problem.markdown:
1. What is the amount of memory used for storing, 256X256 colored image with pixel depth of 8 bits?
(x) 192 KB ( ) 64 KB ( ) 65536 B ( ) 96 KB
2. Which of the following relation is correct?
(x) [R, G, B] = [1,1,1] � [C, M, Y] ( ) [R, G, B] = [1,1,1] � [H, S, V] ( ) [R, G, B] = [1,1,1] � [Y, Cb, Cr] ( ) [R, G, B] = [1,1,1] � [M+Y, C+Y, C+M]
3. Which of the following colour plane is used to change the any specific colour is HSI colour model
(x) Hue ( ) Saturation ( ) Intensity ( ) None of the Above
4. Given a colour image with a dark appearance, which color model should you use so that the processing preserves the colour but brightens the image?
( ) RGB (x) HSI ( ) CMY ( ) None of the above
5. A surface coated with cyan pigment is illuminated with white light. Choose the correct option.
(x) No red light is reflected from the surface. ( ) Only red light is reflected from the surface. ( ) All red and blue lights are reflected from the surface. ( ) No light is reflected from the surface.
problem.p: 1. What is the amount of memory used for storing, 256X256 colored image with pixel depth of 8 bits?
2. Which of the following relation is correct?
3. Which of the following colour plane is used to change the any specific colour is HSI colour model
4. Given a colour image with a dark appearance, which color model should you use so that the processing preserves the colour but brightens the image?
5. A surface coated with cyan pigment is illuminated with white light. Choose the correct option.

choicegroup.choice: No red light is reflected from the surface.
Only red light is reflected from the surface.
All red and blue lights are reflected from the surface.
No light is reflected from the surface.
